tool_description: Logs and tracks all inventory movements within the warehouse including transfers, additions, removals, and location changes with full audit trail.

movement_type.description: Type of movement: inbound, outbound, transfer, adjustment, return

quantity.description: Number of units in the movement

source_bin.description: Origin bin ID (null for inbound movements)

destination_bin.description: Destination bin ID (null for outbound movements)

operator_id.description: ID of warehouse operator performing the movement

reason_code.description: Reason for movement: replenishment, pick, cycle_count, damage, return

reference_number.description: Reference number (order ID, transfer ID, etc.)

error_messages: Invalid movement_type: Must be one of [inbound, outbound, transfer, adjustment, return].
Invalid quantity: Must be a positive integer greater than 0.
Invalid bin combination: Transfer movements require both source_bin and destination_bin.
Insufficient inventory: Source bin does not contain enough items for the movement.
Invalid operator_id: Operator must be registered in the warehouse system.
Bin capacity exceeded: Destination bin does not have sufficient capacity.
usage: Provide movement_type, sku, quantity, and operator_id. Include source_bin and/or destination_bin based on movement type. Optionally add reason_code and reference_number for tracking.

movement_id.description: Unique identifier for this movement transaction

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the movement was logged

updated_inventory_levels.description: Updated inventory levels for affected bins
